name: @vouchsafe/node
description: Official TypeScript and Node.js library for the Vouchsafe identity platform. Use it for easy KYC checks, identity verification, remote right-to-work and more.
author: Vouchsafe

scripts.generate: curl -s https://app.vouchsafe.id/openapi/swagger.json -o swagger-temp.json && node scripts/patch-openapi-discriminators.js swagger-temp.json && npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i swagger-temp.json -g typescript-fetch -o src/openapi --skip-validate-spec --additional-properties=modelPropertyNaming=original && node scripts/post-process-unions.js && rm swagger-temp.json && npm run generate:exports
